Desc.entry: Aims to improve the quality of life for all who live and work in the Kelham Island and Neepsend area. Anyone with an interest in the area is welcome to the meetings. Achievements so far include significant input into the Action Plan for the area now adopted by the Council, encouraging community within and between the new residential developments, improving safety and reducing fear of crime within the area in conjunction with the police and City Centre Ambassadors and organising river clean-ups, bulb and tree planting in order to improve the greenery in the area
